Actually, the problem with Ryze l̶i̶e̶s̶ somewhere else
lyze
What if his mana scaling was based off of _current_ mana, instead of max? Kind of like Seraph's shield.

It could work if they also gave him a way to actually run oom (or at least just lower on mana) at all points of the game. For example, add to his spells current or max mana cost (current probably better).

So, if his Q mana cost looked like 40 +2% of current mana, W 50-90 +2,5%, E 40-100 +2,5% then Ryze would start running off of mana relatively quickly while also having highest damage output at the time and then slowing down, both in cost and in damage.
That's really not the problem. The problem is that he's a late game scaling champ that's based around spamming spells.

I'm sorry but have you played Aatrox right now

He is one of the few champs that counters Fiora right now.

The only problem with him is his trash late game, but even then he's like Wobbuffet in the fact that he probably the best death fodder in the game.

I absolutely love Aatrox.  He is definitely not as bad as people think, but there is no way on earth that he counters Fiora.  I would go as far as to say that Fiora is one of the most annoying lanes for an Aatrox.  Fiora has sustain, which in his current state, Aatrox cannot fight against.  She can completely negate your only form of engage, ensuring that you cannot get out once you are in.  While it is true that her true damage is not as effective against him, did you know that her heal ult pops on his bloodwell?  She can ult him with bloodwell up, which means she kills him.  When the bloodwell is popped, then she heals all the damage Aatrox may have dealt and proceeds to kill him.

There are definitely champions that Aatrox can do well against, I would say his best matchups are Yorick and Maokai.  Yorick because Aatrox gets so many more W heals off on the ghouls, but oddly enough, his W works on Yoricks wall as well.  Maokai just because hes a tank with little early game damage, there are other champs I could have used instead.

Although less common, he is probably a hard counter to kassadin, and easily beats shen
